dialogue_turns.text: What?! Yes, exactly! I saw that, um, and I was like, whoa!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Like, this new healthcare ministry order is no joke. They're updating everything.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Healthcare has approved an updated order regulating nutrition standards in healthcare and educational institutions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Everything! And doctors are actually prescribing meals now, like, it's not just a cafeteria thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Everything! And doctors are actually prescribing meals now, like, it's not just a cafeteria thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meals are prescribed by the attending physician, recorded in the patient's medical history, and forwarded to the hospital kitchen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! In the patient's medical history. And the four-meal daily schedule, like, minimum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! In the patient's medical history. And the four-meal daily schedule, like, minimum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A four-meal daily schedule is introduced, with the possibility of increasing to six meals per day if necessary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Minimum! But then it can go up to six! That’s, uh, intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Minimum! But then it can go up to six! That's, uh, intense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A four-meal daily schedule is introduced, with the possibility of increasing to six meals per day if necessary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the prohibitions! No GMOs, no mechanically separated poultry meat, oh my god.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the prohibitions! No GMOs, no mechanically separated poultry meat, oh my god.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The use of GMO products, mechanically separated poultry meat, and collagen-containing raw materials is strictly prohibited.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! That’s huge. And even for schools, you know, they're banning catering for kindergartens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! That's huge. And even for schools, you know, they're banning catering for kindergartens.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right! I missed that bit. So, like, no outside food prep for the youngest ones.

dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, exactly. And the buffet-style options for older kids, or lunch packs. That's kinda cool.

dialogue_turns.text: It is! And the one to six meals depending on how long they're there. It’s so, um, tailored.

dialogue_turns.text: Totally tailored. And, like, medical staff monitoring food quality. It's not just a chef anymore.

dialogue_turns.text: No, exactly! And the diet has to be, uh, 75% plant-based, low salt, low sugar.
